name: Scott Pilgrim vs The World Android demo
name_original: Scott Pilgrim vs The World Android demo
description:
This is a free one level demo version of a ps3/xbox360 game running on Android device. 

It was coded under B4A framework with Libgdx library. 

Movements:

Tap twice left or right for running.

Right + down + right: Shoryuken fist

Down + right : Whirlpool kick
